title: EastEnders spoilers: Karen and Mitch defend Keanu over Sharon affair
text:
To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video

Keanu Taylor (played by Danny Walters) and Sharon Mitchell’s (Letitia Dean) affair secret has already been discovered by Mel Owen (Tamzin Outhwaite) and she could expose the truth at any moment. And when their relationship bombshell does inevitably come out, Karen Taylor (Lorraine Stanley) and Mitch (Roger Griffiths) will be fighting their son’s corner.

Exclusively discussing what’s around the corner with Metro.co.uk, actors Lorraine and Roger have teased that the Taylors will be going head-to-head with the Mitchells.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Roger told us: ‘It’s about family support, that’s what it’s about and balance. And remember, Keanu is my son as well. I brought him up and it’s that thing of the care of duty.

Lorraine continued: ‘Karen would protect her son to the bitter end.’

Don’t mess with the Taylors (Picture: Backgrid)

‘And the father has to support,’ Roger added.

‘She ain’t gonna let no one take the mick out of him,’ Karen continued. ‘Even if he’s done wrong, she’ll be there.’

Looks like the Taylors won’t be backing down in a showdown with the Mitchells, so we better get our popcorn prepped!

description: EastEnders spoilers: Karen and Mitch defend Keanu as affair with Sharon is exposed.
